name: Apple Products UI Kit
description:
About

I started with the Apple Pencil and then I couldn't stop. The goal for this kit is to keep it updated with the newest Apple products. Hope this is helpful for you to prototype and show up best your designs!


Anything I can improve? Let me know @emirsaldierna on Twitter.

Changelog


Mar 17 2022

  • Mac Studio
  • Studio Display
  • iPad Air (2021)
  • MacBook Pro 14''
  • Apple Watch Series 7 (New design, bands and variants)
  • iPhone 13 Pro & iPhone 13 in new green colors


June 7 2021

  • File revamp! Now everything works with variants
  • iMac (2021, in all 7 different colors)
  • Siri Remote (2nd. Generation)
  • AirTags
